name: Nikkor 50mm f/1.4
about: High-speed prime. Standard 35mm focal length. Ideal for available light photography.

name: Mamiya 80mm f/2.8 (6x7)
about: Standard lens for the RB/RZ system. Well-documented aperture performance.

name: Zeiss Planar 80mm f/2.8
about: Reference lens for Hasselblad V-System. Known for high-precision mechanical aperture stops.

name: Schneider Symmar 150mm f/5.6
about: Large Format standard. Exposure requires bellows extension compensation if focused closely.

name: Nikkor-SW 90mm f/8
about: Wide-angle Large Format. Requires careful bellows compensation due to the shorter focal length relative to the film plane.

name: Canon 35mm f/2.0
about: Wide-angle street prime. Reliable aperture range for 35mm format photography.
